name: The Sample Finder
description:
Sound sample preview program for AmigaOS 3!

Have a lot of samples and you want an easy way to find them and preview them? Here you go! Displays a list of samples in a folder and can preview any PCM audio sample at ProTracker's C-1, C-2, and C-3 frequencies. Also plays Amiga format IFF 8SVX samples!

Inside the ZIP file is the Amiga executable which can be copied to an Amiga computer, along with another copy of the executable on an 880KB ADF disk image for emulators.

System Requirements
  • AmigaOS 3.1 or better
  • 512KB Chip RAM

No dependencies needed, only uses built-in OS 3 libraries. May leak memory like a sieve.

Details

Written in C and 68000 ASM using Cubic IDE on an expanded Amiga 2000. Compiled with VBCC. Cover photo made in Cloanto Personal Paint 7.1c.
